obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_63_0: * Oh^1, excuse me. I am Kris's mother^1, Toriel.../
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_67_0: \E4* Oh^1, you do? And you are..^1. Susie^1, are you not?/
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_69_0: \E6* H..^1. huh? You^1, um..^1. remember my name^1, too...?/
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_71_0: \E2* Of course. Ms. Alphys is a good friend of mine./%
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_93_0: \EH* (Kris^1, the hell is Alphys saying about me!?)/%
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_102_0: \E1* Susie^1, why don't you wash your hands over there.../%
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_117_0: \E4* Then we can make the pie together?/%
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_122_0: \EC* Uhh..^1. but I don't know how to.../%
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_130_0: * Do not worry^1, I can teach you!/
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_151_0: \E0* Kris^1, Susie seems like a nice girl./
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_152_0: \E1* I am very happy you are friends with her^1, but.../%
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_167_0: \E1* Kris^1, I..^1. heard from Alphys^1, about her..^1. behavior./
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_168_0: \E8* If by any chance^1, she^1, er^1, influences you^1, er.../%
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_205_0: \E4* Oh^1, Kris^1! How about YOU show Susie how to bake it?/
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_207_0: \E6* Kris!? You know how to make pie!?/%
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_224_0: \EH* The hell haven't you made ME any then^1, dumbass!!/
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_255_0: * Susie^1, you can just call me Toriel outside of school./%
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_281_0: \E4* ..^1. huh? Kris? Oh^1, YOU need to wash your hands too?/
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_282_0: \E1* Then^1, I suppose I shall teach Susie for now./
obj_ch2_scene30b_slash_Step_0_gml_283_0: \E0* Susie and I will start getting ready to make the pie!/%
